"Not for Me"
This month’s PIREP looks at the differences between turbojet and turboprop procedure constraints, as well as directional procedures....Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2019/Feb2019/PIREPFeb19]]>
North Atlantic Operations Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2019/Feb2019/NATOPSFeb19]]> New Reduced Separation Trial and In-Flight Contingency Procedures
Eligible aircraft will see a reduction in longitudinal separation to as close as 14 NM in Shanwick, Gander, and Santa Maria... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2019/Feb2019/NATOPSFeb19]]> Service Information Letter Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2019/Feb2019/NGFMSSILFeb19]]> SID Calculation Issue Affecting NG FMS Aircraft
This Service Information Letter describes an anomoly that prevents certain Flight Management Systems from correctly displaying and tracking SID procedures that have a significant course change... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2019/Feb2019/NGFMSSILFeb19]]>
Inside the FMS <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2019/Feb2019/VNAVDocFeb19]]> Honeywell VNAV Series Now Available as PDF
The entire Honeywell VNAV series is now available for download as a single comprehensive reference document.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2019/Feb2019/VNAVDocFeb19]]>
